trends: There have been no other sightings in Dansville
This sighting has never been favorited.
divs: Sighting Detailsmyself,my wife and two friends where sitting at our campfire in dansville.we were talking about seeing the moons around jupiter several nights before through a friends telescope that he brought to camp. it was around 8:45. my wife happened to glance up and said, ok, what the heck is that? we all looked up and, near jupiter saw the light. it was bright white, round, about the size of one quater of a full moon with a triangle shaped white mist below it, slightly larger than the brighter light. it did'nt move in any direction during the maybe two minutes we observed it. then, it just vanished. after, we all talked about what it could have been,but came up with no answers. the fact that it didn't move, grow or change color(meateorite), and just disapeared left us without any answer to what we saw.
Summary: Four of us saw a bright , round, stationary light about the size of one quarter of a full moon with a triangle shaped mist below it.
